item.title: Data Portability feeds
item.description: The future is obviously data and sharing it. The dataportability.org data portability group is pretty awesome. It has a boatload of pretty cool people who are talking about amazing stuff. I have done what i always do whenever i find a movement that i appreciate and subscribed to all of the participants blogs. Good stuff thus far. If you are interested in reading an aggregate - check out my shared DataPortability tag or subscribe to its RSS feed.
